_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

TransportationStatus.description: A document to circulate reports of transportation status or changes in status (events) among a group of participants.

TransportationStatus.title: Transportation Status. Details
TransportationStatus.description: A document to circulate reports of transportation status or changes in status (events) among a group of participants.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Transportation Status. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Transportation Status. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Transportation Status. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Transportation Status. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Transportation Status. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CarrierAssignedID.title: Transportation Status. Carrier Assigned_ Identifier. Identifier
CarrierAssignedID.description: A reference number assigned by a carrier or its agent to identify a specific shipment, such as a booking reference number when cargo space is reserved prior to loading.

UUID.title: Transportation Status. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Transportation Status. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Transportation Status. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Name.title: Transportation Status. Name
Name.description: Text, assigned by the sender, that identifies this document to business users.

Description.title: Transportation Status. Description. Text
Description.description: A textual description of transportation status.

Note.title: Transportation Status. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

ShippingOrderID.title: Transportation Status. Shipping Order Identifier. Identifier
ShippingOrderID.description: A reference number for a shipping order.

TransportationStatusTypeCode.title: Transportation Status. Transportation Status Type Code. Code
TransportationStatusTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of status provided in a Transportation Status document.

TransportExecutionStatusCode.title: Transportation Status. Transport Execution Status Code. Code
TransportExecutionStatusCode.description: A code signifying the overall status of transport service execution.

Consignment.title: Transportation Status. Consignment
Consignment.description: A consignment associated with this Transportation Status report.

TransportEvent.title: Transportation Status. Transport Event
TransportEvent.description: An event associated with this Transportation Status report.

DocumentReference.title: Transportation Status. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to another document associated with this document.

Signature.title: Transportation Status. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

SenderParty.title: Transportation Status. Sender_ Party. Party
SenderParty.description: The party sending this Transportation Status report.

ReceiverParty.title: Transportation Status. Receiver_ Party. Party
ReceiverParty.description: The party receiving this Transportation Status report.

TransportationStatusRequestDocumentRefer.title: Transportation Status. Transportation Status Request_ Document Reference. Document Reference
TransportationStatusRequestDocumentRefer.description: A reference to the Transportation Status Request to which this report is a response.

TransportExecutionPlanDocumentReference.title: Transportation Status. Transport Execution Plan_ Document Reference. Document Reference
TransportExecutionPlanDocumentReference.description: A reference to the Transport Execution Plan associated with the transport service whose status is being reported.

UpdatedPickupTransportEvent.title: Transportation Status. Updated Pickup_ Transport Event. Transport Event
UpdatedPickupTransportEvent.description: Update of the original plan regarding a pickup of goods.

UpdatedDeliveryTransportEvent.title: Transportation Status. Updated Delivery_ Transport Event. Transport Event
UpdatedDeliveryTransportEvent.description: Update of the original plan regarding a delivery.

StatusLocation.title: Transportation Status. Status_ Location. Location
StatusLocation.description: Locations associated with this Transportation Status report.

StatusPeriod.title: Transportation Status. Status_ Period. Period
StatusPeriod.description: A period for which status is provided.
